com.hybris.services.entitlements.condition

Class AbstractConditionStrategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hybris.services.entitlements.condition.AbstractConditionStrategy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ActionHandlerFactory, GrantValidator
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GeoConditionStrategy, MeteredConditionStrategy, PathConditionStrategy, StringConditionStrategy, TimeframeConditionStrategy

    public abstract class AbstractConditionStrategy
extends Object
implements GrantValidator, ActionHandlerFactory
    Base class for condition handling.

    • Field Detail

      • INTERNAL_ACTION_INIT

        public static final String INTERNAL_ACTION_INIT
        Initialization action. Called after condition is set to grant. In the handler strategy can update host grant according to condition status.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
